channel.title: People can not connect to my client says can not connect try connecting in 5 min
channel.description:
Title says it all,
I am running a 474 i have been through client.java and changed server ip from 127.0.0.1 to my server ip i have been in my signlink file and changed the code to work properly i have added 43594 to my exception rule in my firewall on my router and also in my firewall on windows i have been able to successfully host my 317 server i portforward via uttorent sorry if this is not enough detail i am quite braindead i've been working on the 317 source for the past 2 days straight and its 2 am where i live.
can anyone out there help me at all or i have been looking into webclients would this solve any of these problems im coming across i would of thought it would still mean people would get stuck on update server but please let me know
Regards Junes
P.S NOTE!!!! this is NOT a 317 server so do not say go into server.java, egui.java, gui.java do not say i need to portfoward unless 474 uses a different port.... as people have no trouble logging into the 317 (this is for the people who do not read properly so please dont flame)

lol sorry for your new notifications but umm i was asking in general for public …

item.title: People can not connect to my client says can not connect try connecting in 5 min
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

RoidScape.Darkbb:

not at all! there are like over 50 ports to forward to…and btw i was gonna say that you portforwarded the same port for both servers…but thatd make you mad again lol so i didnt say it but not im saying it so, yeah

you don’t know much about servers yet do you?

the only ports to forward are 45394 and 5555 udp and tcp there are only 2 ports to forward and besides the point ummmm did you not just read my post above yours saying my server works without any problem but my new server does not allow people to log in… understand now haha?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

RoidScape.Darkbb:

i was just saying…one server owner to another. lol because i made these mistakes about 50 times each when i first started and idk what step you are on in your server creating so i just thought id warn…sorry if it offended u

haha nah you didnt offend me i was just suprised to hear people dont think up of making backups haha i always have a backup of everything so i can rollback at any intended time guess thats what uni teaches ya though can’t afford to lose any work i just put that into practise with everything as i’ve gotten used to making backups haha thanks for the advice though basic as it sounds haha. on topic i’ve pmed you pimp

item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

before deleting the cache make sure to save it on either a flash drive or a separate HDD because if you lose your cache you will have a hard time getting it back.

your welcome in advance
